item.title: ChatGPT in School: How to Start?
item.description: ChatGPT in School: How to Start? Author: Collective work SLO5, Publication: Oct 26 2023, License: CC BY ChatGPT has sparked a debate on how modern education should adapt to the rapidly changing reality. Participants of the debate at SLO5 high school concluded: The topic of Artificial Intelligence (AI) needs to be introduced into the curriculum. The nature of homework should change, and awareness should be raised. AI will not replace full engagement in learning.
